When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns physicalResourceId, which is âProviderName". For example:

{ "Ref": "testProvider" }

For the Amazon Cognito identity provider testProvider, Ref returns the name of the identity provider.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.
